document.full_text: kevin antoine dodson, star of a viral internet song warning neighbors to watch out for a sexual predator, was arrested and charged with marijuana possession after being stopped for speeding, police said on saturday.
document.title: viral video star antoine "hide your wife" dodson arrested
lines_and_colors: kevin antoine dodson, star of a viral internet song warning neighbors to watch out for a sexual predator, was arrested and charged with marijuana possession after being stopped for speeding, police said on saturday.
